body:
thank you for the explanation, @apaszke!

I did some snooping around and our `ReduceLROnPlateau` implementation is ported from Keras (https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/1370). The current implementation (without this patch) behaves the same way as Keras' `ReduceLROnPlateau` so I think I won't change its behavior for consistency and instead update the docs
